articles.author: Thomas Beaumont, Isabella Volmert
articles.title: Threats pile up as Indiana Republicans confront pressure from Trump on redistricting - AP News
articles.description: Republicans in the Indiana Senate are facing threats as President Trump pushes for lawmakers to redraw the state's congressional map. Trump's goal is to expand his party's power in the 2026 midterm elections. Redistricting is usually done once a decade, but T…
articles.content:
Spencer Deerys son was getting ready for school when someone tried to provoke police into swarming his home by reporting a fake emergency.

articles.author: Stephen Means, cleveland.com
articles.title: Ohio State football vs. Indiana: Game-Time Decisions for the Buckeyes in the Big Ten Championship Game - Cleveland.com
articles.description: Stephen Means, Stefan Krajisnik and Andrew Gillis discuss the difference-making factors in Ohio State football's game against Indiana in the Big Ten Championship Game.
